- Row 81 has an "US viewers (millions)" value of 8.62 and an "Original air date" of April 23, 2009.
- Row 83 has an "US viewers (millions)" value of 8.62 and an "Original air date" of May 7, 2009.

Row 83 satisfies both conditions: the viewer count is 8.62 million, and it originally aired on May 7, 2009. Therefore, the claim is supported by the data in row 83.
